comments:
Build 20020624 (GM1)

Opening the launch configuration dialog, after having deleted some projects, 
resulted in the following walkback in the .log file:

!MESSAGE Launch configuration TestXmlns references non-existing project Xmlns 
testing.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui 4 150 Jun 25, 2002 11:47:04.778
!MESSAGE Internal Error
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Launch configuration TestXmlns 
references non-existing project Xmlns testing.
	at org/eclipse/jdt/launching/JavaRuntime.abort(JavaRuntime.java:908)
	at org/eclipse/jdt/launching/JavaRuntime.getJavaProject
(JavaRuntime.java:794)

(SourceLookupBlock.java:232)

(Compiled Code))
	at org/eclipse/jface/window/Window.runEventLoop(Window.java(Compiled 
Code))
	at org/eclipse/jface/window/Window.open(Window.java:537)
	at 
org/eclipse/debug/internal/ui/launchConfigurations/LaunchConfigurationDialog.doL
astLaunchedConfig(LaunchConfigurationDialog.java:617)

n(LaunchConfigurationDialog.java:578)

The fact that we log these exceptions even though we handle them correctly is 
a known issue.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18098 ***
